name: createScoreRevision
description: Update a score by uploading a new revision for this one.

score.description: Unique identifier of the score document. This can be a Flat Score unique identifier (i.e. `ScoreDetails.id`) or, if the score is also a Google Drive file, the Drive file unique identifier prefixed with `drive-` (e.g. `drive-0B000000000`).

autosave.description: Must be set to `true` if the revision was created automatically.

data.description:
The data of the score file. It must be a MusicXML 3 file (`vnd.recordare.musicxml` or `vnd.recordare.musicxml+xml`), a MIDI file (`audio/midi`) or a Flat.json (aka Adagio.json) file.
Binary payloads (`vnd.recordare.musicxml` and `audio/midi`) can be encoded in Base64, in this case the `dataEncoding` property must match the encoding used for the API request.

dataEncoding.description: The optional encoding of the score data. This property must match the encoding used for the `data` property.

description.description: A description associated to the revision

$ul: **autosave**: True if this revision was automatically generated by Flat and not on
**collaborators**
**creationDate**: The date when this revision was created
**description**: A description associated to the revision
**event**: The last event (action id) of the revision
**id**: The unique identifier of the revision.
**statistics**: The statistics related to the score revision (additions and deletions)
**additions**: The number of additions operations in the last revision
**deletions**: The number of deletions operations in the last revision
**user**: The user identifier who created the revision
**code**: A corresponding code for this error
**id**: An unique error identifier generated for the request
**message**: A printable message for this message
**param**: The related parameter that caused the error
